script.title: op-show-lsp-interface.slax
script.author: cougar
script.synopsis: List LSPs like 'show mpls lsp' does but also adds ingress and/or egress interface info.
script.description: Display a customized view of 'show mpls lsp', using this command together with "match" filter makes it easy to find out all LSPs that go through specific interface

example.title: Output
example.description: Will dispay the output of command "show-lsp-interface".
